_documentation.description: Development/Sandbox pricing plans configuration for CV Photo app using Polar Payment

fields.name: Plan name displayed to users
fields.price: Current price in USD (monthly for sandbox)
fields.originalPrice: Original price (crossed out) to show discount
fields.headshots: Number of headshots included in this plan
fields.polarProductId: Polar Sandbox Product ID for this plan
fields.polarCheckoutUrl: Polar checkout URL (will be generated dynamically)

_documentation.IMPORTANT: These are the actual Polar SANDBOX Product IDs from the API test - verified on 2025-07-24
_documentation.NOTE: Sandbox products are configured as monthly subscriptions, not one-time payments
